event.title: became a barrio and finally a full-fledged town on 1 December 1875

data.event: As time went on, the number of houses in Gahitan increased so that the sitio eventually became a barrio and finally a full-fledged town on 1 December 1875, thanks to Governor-General Jose Malcampo y Monje (1874-1877).

event.title: 1856, when they were still Spanish naval officers, Malcampo and Mendez-Nuñez, established

data.event: In 1856, when they were still Spanish naval officers, Malcampo and Mendez-Nuñez, established the first Masonic lodge in Kawit under a charter from the Grand Lodge of Portugal.
